definition: adhering to fixed types or methods, a cursive form of Egyptian hieroglyphics
details:
adjective
- adhering to fixed types or methods
- written or belonging to a cursive form of ancient Egyptian writing
= example: written or belonging to a cursive form of ancient Egyptian writing
- associated with the priesthood or priests
= synonyms: hieratical
noun
- a cursive form of Egyptian hieroglyphics
= synonyms: hieratic script
